name: Flower (itch) (XXpoomaanXX)
description:
Keep good care of your flower to help it grow.

How to play:
WASD to change seasons
(W - winter, A - spring, S - summer, D - Rainy)
Bugs will stop your growth and reduce your health
If your flower doesn't get enough sunlight and water, it's health will deplete

Specialty of each Season
Summer -  Get highest Sunlight, but lose water quickly
Winter - Remove insects
Rainy - Water your plant, but no sunlight
Spring - Restore health when you have enough sun and water

Game made for TriJam #70
Theme: Seasons

Time Taken (According to my timer)
Documentation: 12 minutes
Sprites: 47 minutes
Programming: 1 Hour 34 minutes
Bug Fixing: 28 minutes

Total time: 3 hours 1 minute (so close...)

Sprites made by me
Sound Effects taken from freesound.org
BG Music: Fun on the Farm by Roman Cano
